name: RangeFormat
description: A format object encapsulating the range's font, fill, borders, alignment, and other properties.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: fill
properties.description: Returns the fill object defined on the overall range.

properties.name: borders
properties.description: Collection of border objects that apply to the overall range selected

properties.name: font
properties.description: Returns the font object defined on the overall range selected

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the horizontal alignment for the specified object.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the vertical alignment for the specified object.

properties.name: wrapText
properties.description: Indicates if Excel wraps the text in the object. A null value indicates that the entire range doesn't have uniform wrap setting

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
